item.description:
Join The Providence Collective to watch the first NFL game of the 2011-2012 season.

We'll check out a sports bar just south of Providence, Dave's Bar & Grill.  (Thanks for the suggestion, Jeff!)

Wear your green and yellow, or your black and gold to cheer on your favorite team.  (Or you can join me in wearing Cardinal red ;-)

We'll arrive at 8 or 8:15, and the game starts at 8:30.

See you there!

 

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Davess-Bar-and-Grill/140749054701?v=info
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red St. Louis Cardinals hat.
item.name: First NFL game of the 2011-2012 season: Packers vs. Saints
